description: This is a talking doll, meant for children.  Fortunately it still works, and you could unload the batteries out of it.
This is a talking doll, meant for children.  Fortunately it still works, and you could unload the batteries out of it.
A swimming kickboard, would be a great training aid for the beach or the pool, if only they weren't full of zombies and mutant fish.
A high-drag projectile used in the sport of badminton.
A pin-shaped piece of wood meant for holding a golf ball slightly off the ground.
A small, hard plastic ball with round indentations on it.
A colorful, hard plastic ball for playing games on a pool table.  Essentially a rock.
A large, heavy ball with finger holes for better grip.  Before the apocalypse, its main purpose was to be rolled along waxed floors.
A baseball, good for throwing at enemies.  Getting hit with one of these hurts a lot more than you might think.

//: lazerlyte trainer target was used as a reference
description: A collection of laser guns and targets designed to help you practice shooting.  The spot you 'hit' is displayed on the targets.
//2: 670 grams for the target with a bit extra for the generic laser + connectors

description: A heavy circular block of solid rubber, normally used for playing hockey.  You can throw it to cause some serious harm.

A small white ball made of solid rubber with a smooth, hard surface.  It has no seams or textured surface, ensuring a consistent and predictable grip for players during a game of field lacrosse.  You can also play wall ball and other games with it.

A small, white ball made of solid plastic, resembling to a golf ball, but larger.  It has a smooth and hard surface with a rounded shape and round indentations on it, meant to be used in a game of field hockey.
A small, cylindrical wooden stick, tapered at both ends and meant to be used at a game of gilli-danda
A long wooden stick that, in a game of gilli-danda serves as the target or base for the gilli to be struck.

A large, heavy, smooth-surfaced granite sphere with a flat bottom.  It has a circular circumference and a concave upper surface, and is typically used in the sport of curling.  Can cause serious harm if you hit someone with that.
A heavy metallic spherical object used in the field event of shot put.  This one is intended to be used in the male category, being heavier than the female category one.
A heavy metallic spherical object used in the field event of shot put.  This one is intended to be used in the female category, being less heavy than the male category one.
A smooth-surfaced, polished, solid, somewhat small metallic sphere used in the game of petanque.  Perfect for throwing at your now undead neighbor.

This is a solid , small plastic sphere, also known as jack or target ball, and probably the cousin of the pallino ball.  While not the best ball to play any game, you surely can play a game of petanque if you get some petanque balls.
This is a solid, somewhat large plastic sphere used in the game of bocce.  With a pallino ball, often called jack, and some extra bocce balls, you could play a game of bocce.
This is a solid plastic sphere, also known as jack or target ball.  While not the best ball to play any game, you surely can play a game of bocce if you get some bocce balls.
This is a plastic croquet ball that can be used to play a game of croquet, not much useful for anything else.

This is a croquet wicket, also known as a hoop.  It is a crucial element of croquet.  It is made up of a pair of upright metal bars bent into an arch shape.  If you don't plan on playing croquet with it, you can throw it at your foes.

A distant cousin of the baseball, also known as pelota ball.  It is a small, hard, handcrafted ball used in the sport of jai alai, made of leather.  Good for throwing at enemies and playing wall ball.  Getting hit with one of these hurts a lot more than you might think.

A extremely light, hollow plastic white ball, featuring a perforated design with multiple holes on one side.  This construction allows for unique flight patterns when thrown, fun to play with, but not really a weapon.
A small, colorful spherical object that fits comfortably in the hand.  Fun to play with, but not useful for anything else.

A softball,  a yellow relative of the baseball used to play, well, softball.  Good for throwing at enemies and playing wall ball.  Getting hit with one of these hurts a lot more than you might think, as softballs are larger and denser than baseballs.

A inflated, oval-shaped ball made of leather and string, it's easily thrown but does little damage.  You could take it apart into leather if you wanted, deflate it for easer transportation, or play games such as juggling.
A deflated, oval-shaped ball made of leather and string.  You could take it apart into leather if you wanted, or inflate it again.

A inflated, oval-shaped heavy ball made of leather and string, of Georgian origin, meant to play lelo burti. It's easily thrown and can cause some damage.  You could take it apart into leather if you wanted, deflate it for easer transportation, or play games such as wall lelo burti and other games too.
A deflated, oval-shaped heavy ball made of leather and string.  You could take it apart into leather if you wanted, or inflate it again.

use_action.msg: You inflate the lelo ball.  Chveni!

description: A inflated, oval-shaped sports ball used in the game of rugby.  It is slightly larger than a standard American football and is made of leather.  The outer surface of the ball is textured to provide better grip.  You could take it apart into leather if you wanted, deflate it for easer transportation, or play passing and catching with a wall or friend, as well as other games too.
A deflated rugby ball for better transportation.  You could take it apart into leather if you wanted, or inflate it again.

use_action.msg: You inflate your rugby ball.  Ball!

description: A inflated, oval-shaped ball made of leather with a textured outer surface for enhanced grip and control, made to be used in a game of Aussie footbal.  You could take it apart into leather if you wanted, deflate it for easer transportation, or play passing and catching with a wall or friend, as well as other games too.  It is a little larger than a American football, and resembles more to a giant egg.
A deflated Aussie football for better transportation.  You could take it apart into leather if you wanted, or inflate it again.

use_action.msg: You inflate your Aussie football.  Go footy!

description: A high-quality, size 7 indoor basketball.  Perfect if you want to play some basketball, even alone.
A high-quality, deflated size 7 indoor basketball.  You can inflate it again if you want.
A high-quality, size 7 outdoor basketball.  If you are feeling lonely or bored, you can try playing some basketball alone with that.
A high-quality, size 7 outdoor basketball, deflated for better transportation.  You can inflate it again if you want.
A standard regulation volleyball.  You can deflate it for better transportation or play wall ball and other games with it
A standard regulation volleyball, deflated for better transportation.
A brightly colored beach volleyball.  It is slightly larger than a regular white one and you can deflate it for better transportation or play wall ball and other games with it.
A brightly colored beach volleyball, deflated for better transportation.  You can inflate it again if you want.
A small, cylindrical object made of hard wood, used in the Swiss sport of Hornussen.
A flat, round disc made of plastic, normally used for playing shuffleboard.  You can throw it to cause some harm, but it is not that dangerous.
Just a bandy ball ball made of rubber, good enough to play a game of bandy or rinkball.  You can also play wall ball with those if you are bored.

variants.description: This is a commercial-grade bandy ball.  It is a small, solid rubber ball specifically designed for the game of bandy.  You can also play wall ball and other games with that.
This is a cerise coloured bandy ball, meant to be used at a game of bandy, but you can play wall ball amd other games with that.  Cerise is a deep to vivid reddish pink.

This spherical, blue rinkball is specifically designed for playing rinkball.  It is made of rubber and is blue to differentiate it from the bandy ball.  You can also play wall ball and other games with that.

description: Just a lacrosse ball made of rubber, hard and compact enough to play a game of lacrosse.  You can also play wall ball with those if you are bored.

variants.description: This is a commercial-grade lacrosse ball.  It is a small, solid rubber ball specifically designed for the sport of lacrosse.  You can also play wall ball and other games with that.

This is a high-level training lacrosse ball made to attend strict specifications, providing consistent weight, bounce, and durability.  This ball was probably approved by official lacrosse governing bodies and are certified for use in professional or collegiate training courses and campaigns, not that any of those will be happening, of course.

This is a high-level professional lacrosse ball made to attend strict specifications, providing consistent weight, bounce, and durability.  This ball was probably approved by official lacrosse governing bodies and are certified for use in professional or collegiate games, not that any of those will be happening, of course.

description: Just a small and hard ball, made of solid plastic and used to play a game of polo.  You can play wall ball and other games with it if you are bored.
Just a ball made of cork, wrapped in tightly wound string, and covered with leather, hard and compact enough to play a game of cricket.  You can also play wall cricket with those if you are bored.

variants.description: This red cricket ball is traditionally used in test matches and most first-class cricket.  It has a dark red color and is typically made with a cork core and a leather outer covering.

This white cricket ball is meant to be used in limited-overs cricket formats such as One-Day Internationals (ODIs) and Twenty20 Internationals (T20Is), but apparently we are not getting those so soon.  It is made with a soft cork core, covered with a white leather outer.  The white color provides better visibility under floodlights and during day-night matches.

This pink cricket ball was a relatively recent addition to international cricket.  It is meant to used in day-night test matches where the ball needs to be visible under floodlights.  The pink ball has similar characteristics to the red test ball but with a pink color, and is designed to maintain visibility and swing properly during the twilight period.

description: A ping-pong ball, also known as a table tennis ball. It is a small, lightweight plastic ball used in the sport of table tennis.  You can play wall ball or hand pong with it if you are bored enough.

variants.description: This is just a lightweight plastic white ping pong ball, to play ping pong with a friend or wall pong alone.  White ones are traditionally used for indoor play.

This is just a lightweight plastic orange ping pong ball, to play ping pong with a friend or wall pong alone.  Orange ones can be used for outdoor play as it provides better visibility against various backgrounds.

This is just a lightweight plastic red ping pong ball, to play ping pong with a friend or wall pong alone.  Red is not a commom color, so probably this one is a limited edition or something like that.

This is just a lightweight plastic yellow ping pong ball, to play ping pong with a friend or wall pong alone.  Yellow is not a commom color, so probably this one is a limited edition or something like that.

description: Just a small, rubber ball used in the sport of squash.  It is made of a hollow rubber material, black in color, and has a high bounce.  Squash balls come in different levels of hardness or 'dots', which indicate their speed and level of play.  You can also play wall ball with those if you are bored.

variants.description: Just a small, black coloured rubber ball with dots, used in the sport of squash.  This one is the slowest and softest ball, typically used by beginners or younger players.  It has a low bounce and allows for more time to react and retrieve shots.

Just a small, black coloured rubber ball with dots, used in the sport of squash.  This one is slightly faster and harder than a 1-dot ball.  It provides a bit more pace and bounce, suitable for intermediate players who have developed better control and technique.

Just a small, black coloured rubber ball with dots, used in the sport of squash.  This one is the standard ball used by most players.  It offers a good balance between pace and control, and was the most commonly used ball in regular matches and tournaments, before the Cataclysm.

Just a small, black coloured rubber ball with dots, used in the sport of squash.  This one is the fastest and hardest ball used in squash.  It was primarily used by professional players or those seeking a highly challenging and fast-paced game.  The 4-dot ball allows for quick rallies and demands exceptional skill and agility.

description: Just a small rubber ball used specifically in the sport of racquetball.  You can also play wall ball with those if you are bored.

variants.description: This is a small blue rubber ball used specifically in the sport of racquetball.  The blue racquetball is the most commonly used ball in racquetball, suitable for general play and tournament play.

This is a small red rubber ball used specifically in the sport of racquetball.  Red racquetballs are uncommon, designed for high-altitude play.  Due to the lower air density at higher altitudes, red racquetballs have a slightly lower bounce to compensate for the thinner air.

This is a small green rubber ball used specifically in the sport of racquetball.  Green racquetballs have a slower speed and higher bounce, making them easier to control and suitable for learning the game.

This is a small black rubber ball used specifically in the sport of racquetball.  Black racquetballs are specifically used for outdoor play, as wind and outdoor conditions may affect the movement of lighter balls.

description: Just a small, spherical white ball specifically made for playing hurling.  Also known as a sliotar, it has a distinctive appearance and design, approximately the size of a tennis ball.  Its outer covering is made of leather, stitched together tightly.  You can also play wall ball with those if you are bored.
Just a small, dense and hard blue rubber ball to play Gaelic handball.  You can also play wall ball with those if you are bored.
Just a small, spherical ball specifically designed for the Brazilian-Israeli sport of frescoball.  You can also play wall ball with those if you are bored.
Just a small, spherical ball specifically designed for the sport of tennis.  You can also play wall ball with those if you are bored.

variants.description: Just a small, spherical optic yellow coloured tennis ball.  This one, due to the color, is probably a professional-grade one used in official plays and tournaments, or the kind you'd brought from stores.
Just a small, spherical white coloured tennis ball.  This one, due to the color, is probably meant to be used on grass courts or in certain tournaments.

Just a small, spherical red coloured tennis ball.  This one, due to the color, is probably a training ball meant to be used in certain beginner programs, specifically designed to have a lower compression level and slower speed.

Just a small, spherical orange coloured tennis ball.  This one, due to the color, is probably designed for young players or to be used in modified formats of the game, providing higher visibility and easier tracking.

Just a small, spherical green coloured tennis ball.  This one, due to the color, is probably used in specific training situations, such as for players adapting to different ball speeds or conditions.  They are often used in coaching and practice drills and typically sold in stores.

Just a small, spherical pink coloured tennis ball.  This one, due to the color, is a special one, probably used to support breast cancer awareness initiatives, honor survivors, remember those lost to the disease, and to support the progress made to defeat breast cancer.

Just a small, spherical blue coloured tennis ball.  This one, due to the color, is a special one, probably used to support prostate cancer awareness initiatives, honor survivors, remember those lost to the disease, and to support the progress made to defeat prostate cancer.
Just a small, spherical yellow coloured frontennis ball. Almost identical to a tennis ball, but with minor differences and used to play frontenis.
Just a small, spherical yellow coloured padel ball. Almost identical to a tennis ball, but with minor differences and used to play padel.
Just a small, spherical yellow coloured beach tennis ball. Almost identical to a tennis ball, but somewhat larger, lighter and softer and used to play beach tennis.

Just a small, spherical black coloured tennis ball.  This black tennis ball was probably used for display or novelty purposes, as this color is not typically used in regular gameplay due to low visibility on most tennis court surfaces.

description: A spherical ball used in the sport of soccer (also known as football in many parts of the world).  It is the essential equipment for playing soccer.  This one has the classic design of a soccer ball, with black pentagons and white hexagons.  You can deflate it for better transportation or play wall ball and other games with it.

A spherical ball used in the sport of soccer (also known as football in many parts of the world), with the classic design of a soccer ball, with black pentagons and white hexagons.  You can inflate it you want.

use_action.msg: You inflate your soccer ball. Gol!

description: A ball made of synthetic leather, designed to be gripped easily.  It is round in shape with a smooth surface, allowing players to pass, catch, and shoot the ball effectively during a game of handball.  You can deflate it for better transportation or play wall ball and other games with it.

A ball made of synthetic leather, designed to be gripped easily.  It is round in shape with a smooth surface, allowing players to pass, catch, and shoot the ball effectively during a game of handball.  It is deflated, you can inflate it if you want.

use_action.msg: You inflate your handball.  Stay tight!

description: This is a weighted ball used for various forms of exercise and strength training.  It is very heavy, don't drop it on your feet.

A yellow, round and resilient ball made of rubber.  Its surface is dimpled to provide better grip and handling in wet environments, especially during a game of water polo.  You can deflate it for better transportation or play wall ball and other games with it.  Too bad the pools are now full of undead and mutant creatures.

use_action.msg: You deflate your water polo ball.

description: A yellow, round and resilient ball made of rubber.  Its surface is dimpled to provide better grip and handling in wet environments, especially during a game of water polo.  You can inflate it you want.

use_action.msg: You inflate your water polo ball.  To the pool!

description: A soft, lightweight red ball used in the game of dodgeball, physical nightmares from high and elementary school.  You can deflate it if you want, or play dodgeball against the wall, as well as other games.
A soft, lightweight red ball used in the game of dodgeball, physical nightmares from high and elementary school.  You can inflate it if you want.

use_action.msg: You inflate your dodgeball.  Catch it!

description: A size 5 Gaelic football made of leather, sightly smaller than a common soccer ball.  You can deflate it if you want, or play wall ball and other games with it.
A deflated size 5 Gaelic football.  You can inflate it if you want.

use_action.msg: You inflate your Gaelic football.  Duine ann!

description: This is a large, lightweight specialized ball used in the sport of cestoball, featuring loops that enable unique gameplay and techniques.  You can deflate it if you want, or play score with a trashbin or other games with it.
A deflated cestoball.  You can inflate it if you want.

This is a specialized ball used in the sport of netball, sightly heavier than a regular basketball and with a pebbled texture to improve grip.  You can deflate it if you want, or play score with a trashbin or other games with it.
A deflated netball.  You can inflate it if you want.

A spherical sports ball approximately the size of a soccer ball, but with a distinctive appearance, made of rubber.  It features a combination of bold contrasting colors on its panels.  You can deflate it if you want, or play score with a trashbin or other games with it.
A deflated korfball.  You can inflate it if you want.

use_action.msg: You inflate your korfball.  Get open!

description: Also known as a faustball, this is a specific type of ball used in the sport of fistball.  It has a distinct physical appearance, being round and white in color, with a textured surface to enhance grip and control.  You can deflate it if you want, play wall ball or other games with it.
A deflated fistball.  You can inflate it if you want.
This is a specific type of ball meant to play futsal, smaller and heavier than a regular soccer ball.  You can deflate it if you want, play wall ball or other games with it.
A deflated futsal ball.  You can inflate it if you want.

This is a giant, unique sports ball used in the game of kinball (obvious).  It has a distinctive appearance characterized by its large size and vibrant colors, being much larger than standard sports balls.  The outer cover of the ball is made of synthetic leather and features multiple panels of different colors for better visibility during the game.  You can deflate it if you want or play with that gigantic object.
A deflated kinball.  You can inflate it if you want.

use_action.msg: You inflate your kinball.  What a lung!

description: A figure of an adult human, as seen in the display case at the mall.  It might be able to fool some zombies if it could attract their attention.
A figure of an adult human, as seen in the display case at the mall.  This one is cradling a talking doll.  It can make sound when powered by batteries and can be used to distract some zombies.

use_action.friendly_msg: You activate the talking doll on the mannequin.
use_action.hostile_msg: Your mannequin seems to have a mind of its own!  If you see this, an error has occurred.
